channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- QRadar Network Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- QRadar Network Security

item.title: CVE-2017-1457|2024-09-17T00:25:29.715Z -- ibm -- qradar%20network%20security
item.description: IBM QRadar Network Security 5.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 128376.

item.title: CVE-2020-4157|2024-09-17T03:27:34.905Z -- ibm -- qradar%20network%20security
item.description: IBM QRadar Network Security 5.4.0 and 5.5.0 contains hard-coded credentials, such as a password or cryptographic key, which it uses for its own inbound authentication, outbound communication to external components, or encryption of internal data. IBM X-Force ID: 174337.

item.title: CVE-2017-1458|2024-09-17T03:48:31.491Z -- ibm -- qradar%20network%20security
item.description: IBM QRadar Network Security 5.4 is vulnerable to a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 128377.
